onboardingResponse.title: Onboarding Response
onboardingResponse.description: Stores responses from the pre-login onboarding flow.

anonId.description: The anonymous user ID from Firebase Auth.

troublingSubject.description: The subject the user finds most troubling.

studyTime.description: How much time the user can study daily.

studySchedule.description: The times of day the user usually studies.

nextExamDate.description: The date of the user's next exam, or 'Not Sure Yet'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the record was created.

/onboardingResponses/{anonId}.description: Stores individual user responses from the onboarding flow.
